title: Sons of the Anzacs 1939-1945
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Australian War Memorial and Frank Bagnall
brief_description: Shows scenes of the Australian forces in the principal campaigns of World War II, from the Middle East to New Guinea and the Pacific, with special reference to Tobruk and the Kokoda Trail. Includes archival footage and newsreels.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Australian War Memorial and Frank Bagnall
